synopsis.text: Me ek and industrious Kyoko Mogami has spent her life supporting her childhood friend and secret crush, Shotaro Fuwa, in his quest for stardom. Working tirelessly behind the scenes, Kyoko's world crumbles when she discovers that Shotaro views her as nothing more than a convenient servant. Fueled by anger and a desire for revenge, Kyoko vows to surpass Shotaro in the cutthroat entertainment industry. As she embarks on her journey to become a top actress, Kyoko faces numerous challenges and meets a diverse cast of characters, including the enigmatic Ren Tsuruga. Join Kyoko as she navigates the ruthless world of showbiz and learns to embrace her own ambitions and worth in this captivating tale of love, betrayal, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
